attributes.action: Prevent the building of a Massive Warehouse (Megashed) at Andover for Tesco's use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the citizens of Andover wish to prevent the building of a 1.2 million square foot warehouse (aka Megashed) alongside the A303 at Andover Airfield.

This will have a major impact on the Landscape, the local Environment, Traffic congestion and Pollution and take the last remaining land, on which we could build a business park to bring high tech good quality jobs to Andover.

The applcation from the developers Goodmans for their client Tesco is referenced APPLICATION NO 07/01951/OUTN 

Objections need to be lodged no later than 27th August 2007 with: 

Ms Madalene Winter
Head of Planning
TVBC Beech Hurst
Weyhill Road
Andover
SP10 3AJ

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Prevent the building of a Massive Warehouse (Megashed) at Andover for Tesco's use"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13699.asp

Prime Minister's Office
